segment.source: How to Access the Client Management Console
segment.target: How to Access the Client Management Console

segment.source: How to Access the Client Management Console
segment.target: How to Access the Client Management Console

segment.source: How to Access the Client Management Console
segment.target: How to Access the Client Management Console

segment.source: Use the App-V 5.0 client management console to manage packages on the computer running the App-V 5.0 client.
segment.target: Use the App-V 5.0 client management console to manage packages on the computer running the App-V 5.0 client.

segment.source: To perform all of the actions available using the client management console, you must have administrative access on the computer running the App-V 5.0 client.
segment.target: To perform all of the actions available using the client management console, you must have administrative access on the computer running the App-V 5.0 client.

segment.source: Use the following procedure to access the client management console.
segment.target: Use the following procedure to access the client management console.

segment.source: To access the client management console
segment.target: To access the client management console

segment.source: On the computer running the App-V 5.0 client, click Start and select Microsoft Application Virtualization Client.
segment.target: On the computer running the App-V 5.0 client, click Start and select Microsoft Application Virtualization Client.

segment.source: For computers running the App-V 5.0 Remote Desktop Services client version, to access client management console follow step 1 of this procedure on the server running the client.
segment.target: For computers running the App-V 5.0 Remote Desktop Services client version, to access client management console follow step 1 of this procedure on the server running the client.

segment.source: When the App-V 5.0 client management console is displayed, click the tab you want to review and perform any required tasks.
segment.target: When the App-V 5.0 client management console is displayed, click the tab you want to review and perform any required tasks.

segment.source: For more information about the client management console tasks see, Using the App-V 5.0 Client Management Console.
segment.target: For more information about the client management console tasks see, Using the App-V 5.0 Client Management Console.

segment.source: Add or vote on suggestions here.
segment.target: Add or vote on suggestions here.
